title: ML Engineering
content:
Production ML Systems

  • Model Serving: API design, containerization, orchestration
  • Monitoring: Drift detection, performance metrics
  • CI/CD for ML: Automated testing, deployment pipelines

System Design

  • Scalability: Distributed training, inference optimization
  • Reliability: Fault tolerance, graceful degradation
  • Cost Optimization: Efficient resource utilization

Implementation Strategies

Best practices from your materials for translating research papers into production systems.

Resources

Paper collection - Production system examples and deployment strategies
